attributes.action: compel company helplines to be totally FREEPHONE instead of PREMIUM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present many financial services companies are ripping-off their customers who are experiencing money problems by charging premium rates for their helplines, particularly the practice of playing music while the advisor researches the customers situation whilst having a cigarette break!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
